text: Confessions of a Shopaholic is a 2009 American romantic comedy movie. It is based on the first two entries in the Shopaholic series of novels by Sophie Kinsella. It is directed by P. J. Hogan. The movie stars Isla Fisher as the shopaholic journalist and Hugh Dancy as her boss. ==References== Category:2009 romantic comedy movies Category:Movies based on books Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Movies composed by James Newton Howard
title: Confessions of a Shopaholic (movie)
